line_1: They rince their moisten'd Wings, as close they skim,
line_2: Both Elements enjoy, and flying swim.

line_1: Who lightly bounding o'er life's surface skim,
line_2: Monarchs of mode, and worshippers of whim.

line_1: Some lightly o'er the current skim,
Some lightly o'er the current skim,
Bathe the webb'd foot, or o'er thy mirror skim,
line_2: Safe may the fowl adown thy waters swim,

line_1: And strike, and dart, and lightly skim,
line_2: And, as I lave each happy limb,

line_1: And strike, and dart, and lightly skim,
line_2: I think, good God! how well I swim!

line_1: But be sure that the syrup you carefully skim,
line_2: While the scum, as 'tis call'd, rises up to the brim;

line_1: I left this milk-pan yet to skim,
line_2: And saw no bubbles on the brim!
